name: 白俊恩
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
9/12 Meet ‘n’ Greet; intro to the class; 
9/19 Sir Ken Robinson: “Do Schools Kill …?” TOEIC: What it is and what it isn’t
9/26 Has school changed? 
10/3 Collocation and concordance: rip, strip, recycle; Literacy
10/10 HOLIDAY
10/17 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 1
10/24 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 1 (cont’d)
10/31 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 1 (cont’d)
11/7 MIDTERM EXAM
11/14 Feedback on exam; 
11/21 Reading Television: “It’s a wonderful Lie”
11/28 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 6
12/5 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 6 (cont’d), chapter 7
12/12 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 7 
12/19 Reading Television: “It’s a Wonderful Lie” + discussion w/ questions
12/26 Simpsons Roasting; Chapter 8
1/2 Widdowson Reading & Thinking in English, Chapter 8 
1/9 FINAL EXAM + SELF-EVALUATION
scorePolicy:
midterm = 20%
final = 20%
participation = 60%

NOTE: Participation includes attendance.
